comment._content: Robert Edward Adamson (1871-1935), New York City official, became Fire Commissioner in 1914: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Adamson_(FDNY_Commissioner)

comment._content: Newly appointed by the recently-chosen mayor-elect, John Puroy Mitchel.
